titleStmt.title: [A nest of ninnies Simply of themselues without compound. Stultorum plena sunt omnia. By Robert Armin.]
Foole upon foole
titleStmt.author: Armin, Robert, fl. 1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T. E[ast] for Iohn Deane,

notesStmt.note: Another edition, revised and enlarged, of: Foole upon foole.
Title supplied in manuscript; printer's name from STC.
Identified as STC 775 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
